summary: Data Analyst and QA Engineer with 4+ years across data validation, BI reporting, test automation, and IT support. M.S. in Information Science (4.0 GPA). Skilled in Power BI, Tableau, SQL, Python, Cypress, Postman, and K6. Experienced validating analytics for EdTech and financial platforms, building dashboards, and supporting academic IT. No visa sponsorship required.

bullets: Resolved 600+ Tier 1 and Tier 2 IT incidents involving Windows/macOS, authentication, application access, and hardware, restoring service for faculty, staff, and students.
Reimaged and deployed Windows 10/11 and macOS systems to standardized baselines; performed hardware repairs (RAM, SSDs, batteries) to extend device lifecycle.

Supported MFA and account recovery using DUO and Microsoft Authenticator; analyzed incident trends using KACE and updated 120+ knowledge base articles, improving chatbot self-service resolution by 25%.
Tracked IT assets using AssetTiger; built Excel/Power BI summaries for resolution rates and ticket trends to support operational decisions.
Supported Python instruction covering control flow, data structures, debugging, and object-oriented programming.
Graded and reviewed 100+ programming submissions, providing structured feedback to improve correctness, logic, and maintainability.
Led frontend test automation using Cypress in CI/CD across 30+ release cycles, increasing regression coverage by 35% and improving release stability.
Designed and executed REST API testing with Postman and Swagger across 100+ endpoints; performed load testing with K6 to identify latency bottlenecks.
Owned defect lifecycle in JIRA; presented QA risk assessments and test coverage during sprint planning and release reviews, influencing go/no-go decisions.
Validated analytics data and KPI accuracy for a global EdTech platform; built Power BI dashboards for program features and defect trends.
Executed functional and regression testing for financial web applications; logged and tracked 100+ defects in OrangeScrum with clear reproduction steps and severity.
Maintained and executed Selenium WebDriver UI automation scripts; supported performance and device validation testing.
